name: Capture The Flag (One Use Arrow)
description:
Capture The Flag 

In this game your goal is to capture the flag using arrow keys. But a key can only be used once, Unless you collect it again.

This game is made for ( Game Zanga 10) game jam

Developer : Ahmed Mansy

Art: Mahmoud Elkomy +
https://opengameart.org/content/battle-location-top-down-2d-tileset
Sound : https://opengameart.org

Enjoy
